pullRequest.body:
---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

### PR summary [8b9da4f033](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/13970/commits/8b9da4f03311347354168b0a49f32c18129543ce)

<details><summary>

#### Import changes for modified files

</summary>

Dependency changes

| File | Base Count | Head Count | Change |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mathlib.Tactic.Linter | 14 | 16 | +2 (+14.29%) |
| Mathlib.Data.Rat.Defs | 256 | 258 | +2 (+0.78%) |
| Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Comma.Arrow | 299 | 301 | +2 (+0.67%) |
| Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Monoidal.End | 374 | 376 | +2 (+0.53%) |
| Mathlib.Data.NNRat.Defs | 458 | 460 | +2 (+0.44%) |
| Mathlib.Analysis.CStarAlgebra.Basic | 1202 | 1204 | +2 (+0.17%) |
| Mathlib.LinearAlgebra.CliffordAlgebra.Even | 1236 | 1238 | +2 (+0.16%) |
| Mathlib.LinearAlgebra.CliffordAlgebra.EvenEquiv | 1239 | 1241 | +2 (+0.16%) |
| Mathlib.Analysis.Quaternion | 1597 | 1599 | +2 (+0.13%) |
| Mathlib.Tactic | 2156 | 2158 | +2 (+0.09%) |


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
There are 4063 files with changed transitive imports: this is too many to display!

</details>

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ Lean.FileMap.rangeToPositions`
`+ getNoLintSimp`
`+ getUnnecessarySyntax`
`+ imNotSimp`
`+ imSimp`
`+ imSimpToo`
`+ runOrMessage`
`+ simpNF`
`+ unnecessarySyntax`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/f165f7e3-ffed-4c7a-9371-062b67ea3f67) for commit e8dbd962c38ed953a9fbbcf4449436e962cda5bf.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/cd73cb55-8d93-46e4-aa9d-08eccb9eba71/to/f165f7e3-ffed-4c7a-9371-062b67ea3f67) against commit feba7083215c280aeda7173e3013e2e61177f4ee:
```diff
  Benchmark                                              Metric         Change
  ============================================================================
- ~Mathlib.LinearAlgebra.TensorProduct.Graded.External   instructions     3.3%
```
I looked at the build log: the linter fails to build now; presumably something about simp changes and this linter needs to be updated.

pullRequest.title: feat: a linter to flag unnecessary uses of `nolint simpNF`
